# UINavigationBar

**Property List Key**

Navigation bar visibility and configuration during launch.

## Discussion

When you provide a dictionary for this key, the system displays a navigation bar during launch. You can optionally set the dictionary’s [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/UILaunchScreen/UINavigationBar/UIImageName] key to define a custom image for the navigation bar.

Omit this key if you don’t want to display a navigation bar during launch.

## Optional Image

- **UIImageName**: A custom image that replaces the navigation bar during launch.

## Border Elements

- **UITabBar**: Tab bar visibility and configuration during launch.
- **UIToolbar**: Toolbar visibility and configuration during launch.
